summary: Website update to add and promote a new homepage section for "Gram Pradhan Voting Live Result of Whole Villages Around Janghai — Coming Soon", placed at the very top of the front page, with additional requested plugins/widgets (details TBD).

existing_features.title: Add a new promotional section at the very top of the homepage (above the existing hero section) with the exact title text: "GRAM PRADHAN VOTING LIVE RESULT OF WHOLE VILLAGES AROUND JANGHAI COMMING SOON STAY TUNED WITH US...". The section must be visually prominent and clearly separated from the hero.

Implement a 'Live Results (Coming Soon)' results widget inside the new homepage section that can display vote counts per village/candidate from the backend and automatically refreshes periodically (polling) to simulate live updates.

Add an Admin 'Voting Results' management plugin (new admin module) that allows admins to manage the dataset shown on the homepage results widget (add/edit/remove villages/candidates and update counts).

Add at least one additional 'plugin/widget' outside of the new voting section to satisfy the request for plugins elsewhere on the site, implemented as a non-invasive UI enhancement on the front page (e.g., a slim announcement ribbon or compact highlight card) referencing the same 'Coming Soon' message.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a new homepage section promoted on the front page (top of homepage) titled "Gram Pradhan Voting Live Result of Whole Villages Around Janghai — Coming Soon. Stay tuned with us."
Add new plugins/features inside the new voting section (specific plugins not yet defined).
Add additional plugins/widgets elsewhere on the site (specific plugins not yet defined).

Add backend support in the Motoko main actor to store and serve voting result data (villages, candidates, and counts) and expose public query methods to fetch results plus admin-only update methods to create/update/delete result entries.
